languages.text: "Ты — лишь орудие, проливающее кровь. У тебя нет своей воли, потому ты не можешь противостоять ему. Признай".
"You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."
languages.original_text: "Ты — лишь орудие, проливающее кровь. У тебя нет своей воли, потому ты не можешь противостоять ему. Признай".

traits.locale_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

languages.text: «No es más que un arma diseñada para derramar sangre. No tiene voluntad propia, no puede resistirse a él. Admítalo».
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

traits.locale_text: «No es más que un arma diseñada para derramar sangre. No tiene voluntad propia, no puede resistirse a él. Admítalo».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: 「あなたは血を流すための武器にすぎないわ。自分の意志がないゆえに、あの方に抗うことはできない。それを認めなさい」
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは血を流すための武器にすぎないわ。自分の意志がないゆえに、あの方に抗うことはできない。それを認めなさい」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: “你不过是件杀人的武器而已，根本没有自己的意志，因此你也无法忤逆他。承认这一点吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

traits.locale_text: “你不过是件杀人的武器而已，根本没有自己的意志，因此你也无法忤逆他。承认这一点吧。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: "Ihr seid nichts als eine Waffe, die dazu bestimmt ist, Blut zu vergießen. Ihr habt keinen eigenen Willen, also könnt Ihr ihm nicht trotzen. Gebt es zu."
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nichts als eine Waffe, die dazu bestimmt ist, Blut zu vergießen. Ihr habt keinen eigenen Willen, also könnt Ihr ihm nicht trotzen. Gebt es zu."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: « Tu n'es rien de plus qu'une arme conçue pour verser le sang. Tu n'as pas de volonté propre, raison pour laquelle tu ne peux pas lui résister. Admets-le. »
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."

traits.locale_text: « Tu n'es rien de plus qu'une arme conçue pour verser le sang. Tu n'as pas de volonté propre, raison pour laquelle tu ne peux pas lui résister. Admets-le. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: "Sen kan akıtması için yaratılmış bir silahtan başka bir şey değilsin. Kendi iraden yok ve bu yüzden de ona direnemezsin. İtiraf et."
languages.original_text: "You are nothing but a weapon designed to spill blood. You have no will of your own, and thus you cannot resist him. Admit it."
